# Python Data Structures

## Lists

Ordered, mutable collections that can contain duplicate elements.

```python
# Creating lists
numbers = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
mixed = [1, "hello", 3.14, True]

# Common operations
numbers.append(6)          # Add to end
numbers.insert(0, 0)       # Insert at index
numbers.remove(3)          # Remove first occurrence
popped = numbers.pop()     # Remove and return last element

# List comprehensions
squares = [x**2 for x in range(10)]
evens = [x for x in range(20) if x % 2 == 0]
```

## Dictionaries

Unordered collections of key-value pairs.

```python
# Creating dictionaries
person = {"name": "John", "age": 30, "city": "New York"}
person = dict(name="John", age=30, city="New York")

# Operations
person["email"] = "john@example.com"  # Add/update
age = person.get("age", 0)            # Safe access
del person["city"]                    # Delete key

# Dictionary comprehension
squares_dict = {x: x**2 for x in range(5)}
```

## Sets

Unordered collections of unique elements.

```python
# Creating sets
fruits = {"apple", "banana", "orange"}
numbers = set([1, 2, 3, 2, 1])  # {1, 2, 3}

# Set operations
fruits.add("grape")
fruits.discard("banana")  # Won't raise error if not found
fruits.remove("apple")    # Will raise error if not found

# Set operations
set1 = {1, 2, 3, 4}
set2 = {3, 4, 5, 6}

union = set1 | set2        # {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6}
intersection = set1 & set2  # {3, 4}
difference = set1 - set2    # {1, 2}
```

## Tuples

Ordered, immutable collections.

```python
# Creating tuples
coordinates = (10, 20)
single_item = (42,)  # Note the comma for single-item tuple

# Tuple unpacking
x, y = coordinates
first, *middle, last = (1, 2, 3, 4, 5)  # first=1, middle=[2,3,4], last=5

# Named tuples
from collections import namedtuple
Point = namedtuple('Point', ['x', 'y'])
p = Point(11, 22)
print(p.x, p.y)  # 11 22
```

## Time Complexities

| Operation | List | Dict | Set | Tuple |
|-----------|------|------|-----|-------|
| Access    | O(1) | O(1) | N/A | O(1)  |
| Search    | O(n) | O(1) | O(1)| O(n)  |
| Insert    | O(n) | O(1) | O(1)| N/A   |
| Delete    | O(n) | O(1) | O(1)| N/A   |
